Get ESPN women's college basketball player box

Source: R/espn_wbb_data.R
espn_wbb_player_box.Rd

Get ESPN women's college basketball player box

Usage

espn_wbb_player_box(game_id)

Arguments

game_id

Game ID

Value

Returns a player boxscore data frame

Author

Saiem Gilani

Examples

# \donttest{
  try(espn_wbb_player_box(game_id = 401276115))
